description:
Yamato and Momonosuke look back on Oden’s adventures and heroic actions throughout the world and in the Land of Wano. Yamato describes for Momonosuke all the joy and pain that his father went through during his days.
Source Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Comprehensive Anatomy! The Legend of Kozuki Oden!
Dai Tettei Kaibou! Kouzuki Oden Densetsu!
Eine tiefgründige Analyse! – Die Legende von Oden Kozuki!
Le grand exposé. La légende de Kozuki Oden !
大徹底解剖! 光月おでん伝説!
